sections.heading: Purchase, sale, or offer within state; laws applicable; exceptions
sections.text: (1) Sections 8-1717, 8-1720, and 8-1721 shall apply to persons who sell or offer to sell when (a) an offer to sell is made in this state or (b) an offer to buy is made and accepted in this state.(2) Sections 8-1717, 8-1720, and 8-172
